Html:
Hi,

i'm trying to use Flee with Visual Studio 2005 and 2008. I downloaded the FleeDataTableCompute example and with VS 2008 (after conversion of the Solution) everything went OK, but with VS 2005 i'm getting the run-time error Method not found for one of the System.Reflection methods. Does anyone know a solution? Is a .Net-Framework problem?

Thanks,
Alejandro

I tried it in VS2005 on my machine and it runs fine.

You'll have to give me the exception details before I can track it down further.

Hi,

i'm getting the following error:
Method not found: 'Void System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod..ctor(System.String, System.Type, System.Type[])'.

on line 46 (IDynamicExpression e = context.CompileDynamic("Format(\"The price of {0} is: {1:C2}\", ItemName, price + (price * tax))"); ) of Program.cs in FleeDataTableCompute solution.

Thanks,
Alejandro
Looks like that method was not in the original .NET 2.0 framework and was instead added as part of Service Pack 1.  If you upgrade, then it should work.
